text: is a former Japanese football player. ==Playing career== Mori was born in Osaka Prefecture on April 17, 1981. He joined J1 League club Vissel Kobe from youth team in 2000. Although he played several matches as midfielder like every season, he could not play many matches. In 2005, he moved to Regional Leagues club Rosso Kumamoto. Although he could not play many matches, the club was promoted to Japan Football League from 2006. In 2007, he moved to Regional Leagues club Banditonce Kobe.
